medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric and right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain described as sharp and severe.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began experiencing pain yesterday. The pain is severe and sharp but she denies nausea, vomiting, fever, chills, diarrhea, or constipation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Seizure disorder; history of open distal gastrectomy with roux-en-y gastrojejunostomy, duodenal stump leak managed with percutaneous drainage, and wound infections requiring incision and drainage.
